hadiths.text: Al-Qasim said:Aisha intended to set free two slaves of her who were spouses. She, therefore, asked the Prophet (ﷺ) about this matter. He commanded to begin with the man before the woman. The narrator Nasr said: Abu 'Ali al-Hanafi reported it to me on the authority of Ubaydullah

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمَمْلُوكَيْنِ يُعْتَقَانِ مَعًا هَلْ تُخَيَّرُ امْرَأَتُهُ
chapter.eng-name: If Two Slaves Are Set Free Together, Does The Wife Have The Option ?
